A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was so upset that I literally made an account just to give this movie a bad review. The script was terrible. The acting was bad. I mean like cringe worthy bad. The director does not like Star Wars and it shows. I mean some moments where kind of cool with the special effects and all\, but on man come on. I could have done better. I was in a state of shock. Like I could not have accepted the movie as real. Like it was not really happening. I think the only parallels between this movies series and the others is that JJ comes in and gives us an awesome movie (A New Hope)\, Evil Rian Johnson comes in and gives us a piece of crap (Empire Strikes Back)\, and\, HOPEFULLY\, JJ can come back and clean up Rian's mess (Return of the Jedi).
